vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2160 for the sale of alcoholic beverages on property zoned Subarea 7 of Planned Development District No. 366, the Buckner Boulevard Special Purpose District, with a D-1 Liquor Control Overlay, on the northwest corner of South Buckner Boulevard and Scyene Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional five-year periods, subject to conditions
Z-25-000070

*In alignment with ForwardDallas.
